description: An AI-powered note-taking application with smart tagging and linking capabilities

userStories.title: Create Note Model and Schema
userStories.description: Implement the database schema for notes with fields for content, title, creation date, and tags
acceptanceCriteria: Note model includes id, title, content, createdAt, updatedAt fields
Schema supports text content and timestamps

userStories.title: Create Note CRUD Operations
userStories.description: Implement create, read, update, and delete operations for notes
acceptanceCriteria: API endpoints for CRUD operations on notes

userStories.title: Design Note Creation UI
userStories.description: Create a user interface for creating and editing notes
acceptanceCriteria: Clean form for note creation with title and content fields

userStories.title: Display Notes List
userStories.description: Show a list of all notes with titles and previews
acceptanceCriteria: Notes displayed in a scrollable list
Each note shows title and content preview
Clicking a note navigates to detail view
